name: CSG Remix: Slugforce Puzzler
description:
Become the master of managing slugs and deliver the required weapon parts to the cannon, helping out against the hordes of enemies assaulting humanity. Use your brain power to assess the the right conditions and manage to deliver what is asked of you.  

Multiple parts, changing tracks, upgrade stations and trash bins all stand in your way of glory. Is what we would say but the position of a logistics manager is never glorious, it is important work, but never celebrated as the heroes of war. 

Puzzle through 15+ levels that increase as the ghosts at Cool Smithy Games develop new ones. 13 free Levels in the browser version, the rest available in the download. 

This game is a Remix (a new game made from parts of other games by the Cool Smithy Games studio. Usually in a short time frame as well.)

Full remix downloadable release will be live in a few days, in the meantime join our pateron: to support the development of this remix and future ones. 
If you want to give a one time payment instead, support us with the button up top.
